method.description: The method used for the CIF. Currently there are three supported: Gaussian, AR(1), and Homogeneous Poisson. Homogeneous Poisson processes just have a mean rate specified and operate like the point process version of white noise.

tau_rise.description: The sampling rate for the simulation.

tau_decay.description: The total time duration for the simulation in seconds.

Nsims.description: The number of simulations to run, currently in the beta version only 1 is supported.

lambda_0.description: Baseline or mean rate rate for the point process. Note a distinction here: CIFs introduce temporal dynamics into point process firing rates, but lambda_0 introduces a linear y-axis shift on the power spectrum.
